text: Songjiang Nanjing is a metro station on the Songshan-Xindian Line and Zhonghe- Xinlu Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The Songshan-Xindian line station code is G15 and the Zhonghe-Xinlu line station code is O08. == Station layout information == === Songshan-Xindian line === The platforms are located underground. Platform 3 is for Songshan and Platform 4 is for Xindian. === Zhonghe-Xinlu line === The platforms are located underground. Platform 1 is for Luzhou or Huilong and Platform 2 is for Nanshijiao. == Around the station == * Miniatures Museum of Taiwan * Suho Memorial Paper Museum Category:Railway stations in Taipei
title: Songjiang Nanjing metro station
